text: Amber Preston is an American stand-up comedian. In 2011, comic Marc Maron named her one of his five top comedians to watch. In 2018, entertainment website Thrillist named her one of the best undiscovered comedians in America. Her debut album, Sparkly Parts, was released April 17, 2020, debuting at No. 1 on both the Amazon and iTunes comedy charts. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American stand- up comedians Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:People from Fargo, North Dakota Category:Actors from North Dakota Category:Comedians from North Dakota
title: Amber Preston
